Here weâ€™ll walk through the different data files from the synthea data generator. Synthea can generate data in a number of formats including:

  • CCDA
  • CSV
  • FHIR
  • Text
with open('../data/csv/providers.csv') as f:
    for line in f.readlines():
        print(line)

with open('../data/FHIR/Augustine565_Conroy74_8d1c4f3b-3d44-4daf-8962-cc260bad8c87.json') as f:

        print(f'{idx}: {line}')
        if idx >= 5:
            break
